ResearchProjectDef.label: lycanthropic elixir creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of elixirs derived from werewolf blood. These can be used to remove dormant lycanthropy, or convert it into a more useful form.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hunters weapons creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of hunters weapons at the forge. These special weapons deal 50% increased damage against animals and werewolves.
